pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau speaks with Prime Minister Theresa May of the United Kingdom | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau spoke today with Prime Minister Theresa May of the United Kingdom. Both leaders agreed on the importance of maintaining a firm and united stance in deterring the use of chemical weapons in Syria. They further pledged to continue diplomatic efforts with international partners to find a durable political solution to resolve the crisis in Syria.
